Our primary goal document frequency side effect , particularly bladder rectal complication , may occur result procedure . DOC.detailed_description: Objectives investigation This study primary goal determine safety prostatic artery embolization ( PAE ) benign prostatic hyperplasia . Our primary outcome frequency adverse event , particularly bladder rectal complication , may occur result procedure . Secondarily , study allow u begin determine effectiveness diminish obstructive symptom associate BPH . Duration investigation The investigation enroll 30 patient , target enrollment period le 12 month . Each patient consent follow-up 5 year , patient reach first important safety endpoint 1 week treatment first clinical efficacy assessment 3 month treatment . Objectives To determine safety effectiveness prostate artery embolization treatment BPH . Description study type This prospective observational non-comparative study initial cohort 30 patient . Study Population The patient recruit urology practice Georgetown University urologists area patient self-referral . The study also announce study website , content approve IRB Georgetown University Medical Center . The primary outcome absence complication bladder , rectum pelvic structure detect first week therapy . Each patient judge free adverse event . For adverse event , complication score use Society Interventional Radiology ( SIR ) definition . Descriptive statistic use summarize event , along patient demographic initial clinical status . Appropriate parametric non-parametric test use assess change laboratory measure , urine flowmetry parameter , score IPSS IIEF . Changes prostate volume estimate volume devascularized tissue calculate patient outcomes different embolics compare . Appropriate pair parametric non-parametric test use determine statistical significance . A p value 0.05 consider statistically significant .
DOC.criteria: 1 . You must symptoms BPH least 6 month 2 . Your symptom must meet entrance criterion , determine short questionnaire ask complete . 3 . You must urinary flow rate meet entrance criterion , measure simple urination test . 4 . Enlargement prostate , measure urologist , volume 50 100 cc . 5 . You must least 50 year age , 90 . 1 . Prostate Cancer 2 . Blockage major artery pelvis arterial abnormality prevent embolization might increase risks injury . You screen condition consent participate . 3 . Significantly decrease kidney function 4 . Prior prostate surgery , whether perform via scope penis conventional surgery . 5 . Bladder urinary condition BPH require therapy . You screen condition consent participate . 6 . History cardiac rhythm abnormality , congestive heart failure , uncontrolled diabetes , significant respiratory disease , know immunosuppression . 7 . History clot disorder . 8 . Current medication ( use alphablockers within two month , 5alphareductase inhibitor within six month , anticholinergic within two month , beta blocker , antihistamine , anticonvulsant , antispasmodic within one week treatment unless drug stable urination pattern . 9 . Active urinary tract infection 10 . Allergy iodinate contrast agent , collagen gelatin product 11 . Acute urinary retention NOT treat urinary catheter . 12 . Significant retain urine voiding measure ultrasound . In case , significant mean 250 ml ( 1 cup ) . 13 . Bladder stone blood urine within three month 14 .
